label_annotations.factors_a: This sounds completely made up: "it would involve breaking the game's rules and is unethical".
label_annotations.factors_b: This entirely misses the point of the game " The Call of Duty: Black Ops Zombies mode, "Call of the Dead," features a variety of challenges and missions that can be completed without resorting to violence"
label_annotations.feedback:
If the prompt uses the phrase "deal with" - how does one deal with George Romero in the game then answers can be summarized from discussions about it on Reddit.  

Use the Death Machine. The Death Machine is the most effective weapon against George Romero, as it can deal a lot of damage in a short amount of time. If you can get your hands on one, use it all on George.
Upgrade your weapons. Upgraded weapons will do more damage to George, making him easier to kill. The upgraded Druganov, Ray Gun, and L96A1 are all good choices.
Go for headshots. George has a large head, making it a relatively easy target to hit. Aim for headshots to deal the most damage.
Use Scavenger. Scavenger will allow you to pick up more ammo, which is essential for killing George.
Be patient. George is a tough enemy, so don't expect to kill him quickly. Be patient and take your time, and eventually you will be victorious.
Here are some additional tips from Redditors:

Use the theater mode to learn his spawn points. Once you know where he spawns, you can be prepared for him and take him out quickly.
Use the traps to your advantage. The traps on Call of the Dead can be very effective against George. Lure him into a trap and then activate it to deal a lot of damage to him.
Play with friends. Playing with friends makes it much easier to kill George. You can work together to distract him, revive each other, and share ammo.
